name: Magnemite
flavor_text: These Pokémon are attracted to electrical emissions and will often follow people using PokéGear.

attacks.name: Lock-on
attacks.effect: During your next turn, treat any tails flipped when using Magnemite’s Electric Bolt attack as if they were heads. (Benching or evolving either Pokémon ends this effect.)

attacks.name: Electric Bolt
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If both are heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing (not even damage).
